> Convert a BitMEX bin-size to a Trading View timeframe

Install
-------

```shell
npm install @strong-roots-capital/bin-size-to-timeframe
```

Use
---

```typescript
import binSizeToTimeframe from '@strong-roots-capital/bin-size-to-timeframe'
// TODO: describe usage
```
